  .paper-form > section[data-tooltip]:before,
  .paper-form > div[data-tooltip]:before {
    content: attr(data-tooltip);
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: calc(100% - 1rem);
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.625rem;
    background-color: #1474e5;
    color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 0.125rem 0.125rem 0 0;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    box-shadow: 0 -2px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
  }
  .paper-form > section[data-tooltip]:focus-within:before,
  .paper-form > div[data-tooltip]:focus-within:before {
    opacity: 1;
    bottom: 100%;

  }

  .paper-form .radio label.field-label:empty,
  .paper-form .radio label.field-label.hide-label,
  .paper-form .checkbox label.field-label:empty,

    width: auto;
  }

    margin-bottom: 0;
    line-height: 1.5;
    margin-top: 0.25rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }
  .paper-form .radio label:not(.field-label) input,

  }
  .paper-form .form-control-plaintext {

    border: none;
    padding: 0;
  }

  }

  .paper-form .font-sm {

  }
  .paper-form .strong {
    font-weight: 700;

name: DD 2875 Part 2c

elements.name: Part 2
elements.text: PART II (CONTINUED) ENDORSEMENT OF ACCESS BY INFORMATION OWNER, USER SUPERVISOR OR GOVERNMENT SPONSOR (If individual is a contractor - provide company name, contract number, and date of contract expiration in Block 16.)

renderAttributes.data-tooltip: The date IAO signs DD Form 2875.
This item is intended to add additional information, as required.

elements.name: Footer Notice
elements.text: DD FORM 2875, AUG 2009 PREVIOUS EDITION IS OBSOLETE.

elements.name: Status
elements.label: Status
elements.requiredMessage: A valid status must be set.

events.name: Load Review Parts
Add Information Assurance Officer Signature Widget
Add Help Text
